name: Combine Derby
description:
Presenting Combine Derby, a game all about smashing as many things as possible with a combine harvester in a minute, just as nature intended.

Controls:

Player 1: WASD
Player 2: IJKL
Settings: ESC

Gameplay:

The player has a minute to get as many points as they can by hitting and destroying things across the arena. The game can be played alone or with local versus.

This game is a remake of an earlier attempt of the concept in the Bevy game jam. This time the game is made in the Godot engine.

The web version works but I strongly recommend the native Windows and Linux builds as they have much better performance. Graphics and sound options can be changed in the pause menu (press ESC).

Source code available on Github.
